Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Linda49er Hi all, I am a breast cancer survivor of 11 months as well as a valley fever survivor. I was wondering if any of you who have cancer have valley fever as well?? I am trying to find out if my cancer is related to my valley fever. My valley fever was diagnosed in 2003 and breast CA in 2006. Thanks!! and I love this board Warmest regards, Linda Hi Linda , havent really studied valley fever ,have you looked under histoplasmosis, seems like i 've heard its slang name to be valley fever take care and write back merle11 p,s i think i may have replied to your recent message and it may have ended up back in my own mail box . ,.,. not for sure ,i'll have to figure this web site out talk soon
Posts.Title: Does anybody here with breast CA have Valley Fever as well??
